item.title: Spotify 让创作者赚钱更容易，披露播客支出达 100 亿美元
item.description: Spotify 正在扩大其针对创作者的货币化计划，并为视频播客推出新的工具，目的是在蓬勃发展的市场上更好地与 YouTube 和 Netflix 竞争。【原文：Spotify is expanding its monetization program for creators and introducing new tools for video podcasters, as it aims to better compete with YouTube and Netflix in the booming market.】

item.title: CNBC 报道：委内瑞拉石油销售将无限期继续，制裁将减少
item.description: 美国有线电视新闻网（CNBC）周三援引接近白宫的消息人士的话报道称，委内瑞拉对美国的石油销售将无限期地继续下去，制裁也将减少。【原文：Oil sales from Venezuela to the United States will continue indefinitely and sanctions will be reduced, CNBC reported on Wednesday, citing sources close to the White House.】

item.title: 美国 12 月私营部门就业人数反弹不及预期
item.description: 经济学家表示，主要与进口关税有关的政策不确定性导致企业不愿增加员工人数。【原文：Economists say policy uncertainty mostly related to import tariffs has left businesses reluctant to increase their headcounts.】

item.title: 加拿大药房平台将向美国患者提供源自印度的 Ozempic
item.description: 在线药房平台SaveRxCanada.to周三表示，随着对廉价药物的需求增长，该公司已开始向美国患者提供诺和诺德公司从印度采购的糖尿病特效药Ozempic。【原文：Online pharmacy platform SaveRxCanada.to said on Wednesday it has begun offering Novo Nordisk's blockbuster diabetes drug, Ozempic, sourced from India to U.S. patients, as demand for cheaper options grows.】

item.title: Adobe 称，尽管增长放缓，美国在线假日消费仍创下历史新高
item.description: Adobe Analytics 公司周三发布的数据显示，2025 年美国在线假日消费增长放缓，尽管购物者在大幅折扣和更广泛地使用 "即买即付 "计划的支持下创下了新纪录。【原文：U.S. online holiday spending growth slowed in the 2025 season, Adobe Analytics data showed on Wednesday, even as shoppers set a record on the back of steep discounts and wider use of buy-now-pay-later plans.】

item.title: 美元前景疲软，美联储独立忧虑挥之不去
item.description: 接受路透社调查的货币策略师对 2026 年初美元的前景仍然看跌，预计到年底会有小幅下跌，原因是对美联储独立性和降息可能性的持续担忧。【原文：The outlook for the U.S. dollar among currency strategists polled by Reuters remains bearish at the start of 2026, with a modest decline expected by year-end based on persistent concerns around Federal Reserve independence and the possibility of lower interest rates.】

item.title: 美国银行以 "买入 "评级开始覆盖以色列顶级银行
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America）周三开始对以色列四大银行进行评级，给予 "买入 "评级，称这些银行杠杆作用良好，有望从加沙战后的经济发展势头中获益。【原文：Bank of America on Wednesday initiated coverage of Israel's four largest banks with "buy" ratings, saying they are well leveraged and positioned to benefit from post-Gaza war economic momentum.】

item.title: NRG 能源公司任命罗伯特-高德特（Robert Gaudette）自 4 月底起担任首席执行官
item.description: NRG 能源公司周三任命内部人士罗伯特-高德特（Robert Gaudette）为下一任首席执行官，现任首席执行官劳伦斯-科本（Lawrence Coben）将于 4 月底卸任。【原文：NRG Energy on Wednesday named insider Robert Gaudette as its next CEO, after incumbent Lawrence Coben steps down from the role at the end of April.】

item.title: 杂货店 Albertsons 下调年度销售和利润预期
item.description: Albertsons 周三下调了对年度相同销售额和调整后净利润的预期，原因是来自大型竞争对手的激烈竞争，这些竞争对手提供更多的假日折扣，影响了连锁超市的需求。【原文：Albertsons on Wednesday lowered its forecast for annual identical sales and adjusted net income, as stiff competition from larger rivals offering heavier holiday discounts weighed on demand at the supermarket chain.】

item.title: Aktis Oncology 在美国首次公开募股中目标估值高达 9.45 亿美元
item.description: 癌症药物开发商 Aktis Oncology 周三表示，该公司将在其规模更大的首次公开募股中以高达 9.454 亿美元的估值为目标，这凸显了投资者对 2026 年该公司首次在美国上市的强烈需求。【原文：Cancer drug developer Aktis Oncology said on Wednesday it was targeting a valuation of up to $945.4 million in its upsized initial public offering, underscoring strong investor demand for 2026's first U.S. listing.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，摩根大通与代理咨询公司断绝关系
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引一份内部备忘录报道，摩根大通资产管理部门将立即切断与代理咨询公司的所有联系。【原文：JPMorgan Chase's asset-management unit is cutting all ties with proxy advisory firms effective immediately, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing an internal memo.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟再次拒绝派拉蒙的竞标。最新消息
item.description: 华纳兄弟 Discovery 公司周三表示，董事会拒绝了派拉蒙 Skydance 公司修改后的出价，称其为高风险的杠杆收购，会带来巨大风险，并重申支持 Netflix 收购其部分资产的提议。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery said on Wednesday its board rejected a revised bid from Paramount Skydance, calling it a risky leveraged buyout that posed significant risks, and reaffirmed its support for Netflix's proposal to buy some of its assets.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟拒绝派拉蒙修订后的出价，认为其杠杆收购风险很大
item.description: 华纳兄弟 Discovery 公司董事会一致拒绝了派拉蒙 Skydance 公司收购该公司的最新尝试，称其修改后的 1,084 亿美元恶意出价等同于高风险的杠杆收购，投资者应予以拒绝。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery's board has unanimously turned down Paramount Skydance's latest attempt to acquire the studio, saying its revised $108.4 billion hostile bid amounted to a risky leveraged buyout that investors should reject.】

item.title: 汽车行业扩大开源协议以促进开发、降低成本
item.description: 汽车供应链中的 30 多家公司已同意合作开发开源软件，以开发下一代汽车并降低成本。【原文：More than 30 companies across the automotive supply chain have agreed to collaborate on open-source software to develop next-generation cars and cut costs, the German industry lobby behind the initiative said on Wednesday.】

item.title: CF Industries 财务总监卸任，Richard Hoker 被任命为临时首席财务官
item.description: CF Industries 首席财务官格雷戈里-卡梅伦（Gregory Cameron）周三表示，将于 2 月 15 日卸任。【原文：CF Industries' Chief Financial Officer Gregory Cameron will step down from his role effective February 15, the U.S. based fertilizer manufacturer said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国 ETF 提供商在动荡后申请首个委内瑞拉基金
item.description: 一家美国交易所交易基金（ETF）提供商已申请批准推出有史以来第一只追踪委内瑞拉公司的交易所交易基金，因为上周末美国抓捕总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗（Nicolas Maduro）引发了当地资产的反弹。【原文：A U.S. ETF provider has sought approval to launch the first-ever exchange-traded fund tracking companies exposed to Venezuela, as the U.S. capture of President Nicolas Maduro over the weekend sparked a rally in local assets.】

item.title: 标普 500 指数和纳斯达克指数期货在人工智能推动的反弹后走低；劳工数据成为关注焦点
item.description: 周三，与标普 500 指数和纳斯达克指数挂钩的期货走低，原因是在标普 500 指数和道指在上一交易日创下历史新高后，投资者稍作喘息，而在当天晚些时候将公布的一些劳动力市场数据公布前，投资者也开始谨慎。【原文：Futures linked to the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq inched lower on Wednesday, as investors took a breather after the S&P 500 and the Dow hit record highs in the previous session, while caution also set in ahead of some labor market data due later in the day.】

item.title: 早间竞标一切为了工作
item.description: 阿曼达-库珀（Amanda Cooper）对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Amanda Cooper.】

item.title: GameStop 宣布 CEO 股票期权奖励与 1000 亿美元市值目标挂钩
item.description: GameStop 周三公布了首席执行官莱恩-科恩（Ryan Cohen）的薪酬方案，该方案以扭亏为盈为前提，要求他将这家陷入困境的电子游戏零售商的市值提升十倍以上，并大幅提高利润。【原文：GameStop on Wednesday unveiled a compensation package for CEO Ryan Cohen, hinging on a turnaround that requires him to lift the struggling videogame retailer's market value more than tenfold and sharply boost profits.】

item.title: 欧洲领导人努力消除对南方共同市场贸易协定的疑虑
item.description: 欧盟委员会将于本周三设法消除一些欧盟成员国对计划与南美集团南方共同市场（Mercosur）签署的自由贸易协定的担忧，该协定已经酝酿了 25 年，最早可能于下周签署。【原文：The European Commission will on Wednesday seek to dispel the concerns of some EU members over a free trade agreement planned with South American bloc Mercosur and 25 years in the making that could be signed as early as next week.】

item.title: 巴西牛肉产量超过美国，缓解全球牛肉供应紧张局面
item.description: 据市场估计，巴西去年超过美国成为世界第一大牛肉生产国，此前这个南美国家的产量比预期高出数十万吨，缓解了全球供应紧张的局面，并有助于限制肉价飙升。【原文：Brazil surpassed the U.S. as the world's top beef producer last year, according to market estimates, after the South American country beat output forecasts by hundreds of thousands of tons, easing a global supply squeeze and helping limit a surge in meat prices.】

item.title: 美国银行第四季度投资银行业务利润大增
item.description: 随着交易加速，投资银行业务收入激增，预计美国最大的银行将在下周公布第四季度利润增长情况。【原文：The largest U.S. banks are expected to report bigger fourth quarter profits next week, fueled by a surge in investment banking revenue as dealmaking accelerates.】

item.title: 韩国报纸称高通公司正与三星电子洽谈合约制造事宜
item.description: 韩国经济日报》周三援引美国高通公司首席执行官克里斯蒂安诺-阿蒙的话报道，高通公司正在与三星电子就两纳米芯片的合同制造进行谈判。【原文：Qualcomm is in talks with Samsung Electronics over contract manufacturing of two-nanometre chips, the U.S. company's CEO Cristiano Amon was quoted by the Korea Economic Daily as saying on Wednesday.】

item.title: 贸易商称中国炼油商有望用伊朗原油替代委内瑞拉石油
item.description: 贸易商和分析师表示，中国的独立炼油厂预计将在未来几个月内改用来自伊朗等地的重质原油，以替代自美国解除委内瑞拉总统职务后停止的委内瑞拉原油运输。【原文：Chinese independent refiners are expected to switch to heavy crude from sources including Iran in coming months to replace Venezuelan shipments halted since the U.S. removed the country's president, traders and analysts said.】

item.title: 美国-委内瑞拉石油协议激怒中国，推动油价下跌
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府表示已说服委内瑞拉从北京转移供应并进口价值高达 20 亿美元的禁运原油之后，全球石油价格下跌，中国谴责美国恃强凌弱。【原文：Global oil prices fell and China denounced the U.S. as a bully after President Donald Trump's administration said it had persuaded Venezuela to divert supplies from Beijing and import up to $2 billion worth of embargoed crude.】

item.title: 策略浮现：MSCI搁置将加密货币储备公司排除在指数之外的计划
item.description: 亿万富翁迈克尔·赛勒创立的比特币公司Strategy Group Holdings周三盘前交易中股价上涨6%，此前明晟公司（MSCI）取消了将这家比特币持有巨头及其他加密货币资产管理公司排除在其指数之外的计划。【原文：Shares of billionaire Michael Saylor's Strategy rose 6% in premarket trading on Wednesday, after MSCI dropped a plan to exclude the bitcoin hoarder and other crypto treasury firms from its indexes.】

item.title: 多伦多房屋销售连续第三个月下滑，经济不确定性持续发酵
item.description: 多伦多地区房地产委员会周三公布的数据显示，受经济不确定性影响，购房者持观望态度，导致大 Toronto 地区12月房屋销量连续第三个月下滑，房价亦出现下跌。【原文：Greater Toronto Area home sales fell for a third straight month in December and prices declined as economic uncertainty kept homebuyers on the sidelines, Toronto Regional Real Estate Board data showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 三星电子将购买 17.3 亿美元股票用于员工补偿
item.description: 三星电子周三表示，将收购价值 2.5 万亿韩元（17.3 亿美元）的自有股票，用于员工和高管薪酬。【原文：Samsung Electronics on Wednesday said it would acquire 2.5 trillion won ($1.73 billion) worth of its own shares for employee and executive compensation.】

item.title: 中国智能手机制造商 Realme 将成为 OPPO 子品牌
item.description: 中国智能手机制造商 Realme 周三表示，它将作为一个子品牌并入中国消费电子公司 Oppo，此举旨在为这两家共享母公司的公司集中资源、降低成本。【原文：Chinese smartphone maker Realme said on Wednesday that it was being integrated into Chinese consumer electronics company, Oppo, as a subbrand, in a move that aims to pool resources and cut costs for the two companies that share a parent firm.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车公司 12 月份销量增长 2
item.description: 总部位于瑞典的沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Cars）周三表示，12 月份共售出 75049 辆汽车，同比增长 2%。【原文：Sweden-based Volvo Cars sold 75,049 cars in December, up 2% from a year earlier, it said on Wednesday.】
